text: geudaedeul-eun geudeulgwa majdagtteulin gos-eseo geudeul-eul salhaehago geudeul-i geudaedeul-eul chubanghaessdeon gos-eulobuteo geudeul-eul chubanghala. baghaeneun salhaeboda deoug hogdoghan geos-ila. halam seong-won-eseo geudeul-i geudaedeulgwa ssaugi jeonkkajineun geugos-eseo geudeulgwa ssauji malla. geuleona geudeul-i geudaedeulgwa ssaundamyeon geudeul-eul salhaehala. bulsinjadeul-e daehan eungbeol-eun jeoleohadoda
